definitions.text: a sudden event that imparts energy or excitement, usually with a dramatic impact
examples: they gave it another zap of radiation
This show zaps the viewers with some shocking scenes

definitions.text: kill with or as if with a burst of gunfire or electric current or as if by shooting
examples: in this computer game, space travellers are vaporized by aliens

definitions.text: strike at with firepower or bombs
cook or heat in a microwave oven
